intro: Mezereum, commonly known as the May apple, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to eastern North America. Mezereum is often found in moist, wooded areas and is known for its medicinal properties, though its berries are toxic if ingested. Its botanical features make it an important component of forest ecosystems.
